channel.title: coq on Alan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in coq on Alan's Blog

item.title: A Hands-on Introduction to Coq
item.description: Introduction I have been doing quite a bit of functional programming in haskell for the past few months as a part of my university study. That’s why I am delighted to see a relevant challenge come up in this year’s DragonCTF. The challenge involves proving a few mathematical theorems using Coq, a functional programming language / interactive theorem prover. I have heard of Coq before but have never got the time to learn it.
